Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Fiance \Fi"ance\, v. t. [F. fiancer. See {Affiance}.] To betroth; to affiance. [Obs.] --Harmar. [1913 Webster]

Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Fianc'e \Fi`an`c['e]"\, n. [F.] A betrothed man. [1913 Webster]
fiance n : a man who is engaged to be married [syn: {groom-to-be}]
